channel.title: New Server (fixed)
channel.description:
Okay, I just got a new server and I was beta testing..
I died with a new player I made and relogged. Then my items were back... Then a message popped up saying remember to save your game play before logging out. There is a quest option that has game save. Is there any way to make it auto safe?
Thank you. I'm using project insanity I think... Thanks

item.title: New Server (fixed)
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

AtomicInt_:

Avoid the process method at all costs, when something needs executed, execute it. When the event is over, terminate it.

I cannot stress this enough.

Read full topic

item.title: New Server (fixed)
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

Avoid the process method at all costs, when something needs executed, execute it.
When the executed event is over, terminate it.

Read full topic

item.title: New Server (fixed)
item.dc:creator: @killerkody killerkody
item.description:
@killerkody wrote:

Okay, thank you guys!

Read full topic

item.title: New Server (fixed)
item.dc:creator: @lemme_winks lemme_winks_
item.description:
@lemme_winks wrote:

Team_Rocket:

You could place it in a place where content is called every-so-often, such as a Processing method. I recommend against this however, you should make it so it triggers and stops.

“process() is the shit”, lemme_winks_ replied.

Read full topic

item.title: New Server (fixed)
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

You could place it in a place where content is called every-so-often, such as a Processing method. I recommend against this however, you should make it so it triggers and stops.
